text: Ralph Tailboys, Lord of Middleham was an Anglo-Breton knight from Yorkshire. He was a son of Ribald de Bretagne and Beatrice de Taillebois. Ralph was a tenant of count Stephen. He married Agatha, daughter of William de Brus, Lord of Annandale and Christina. He is known to have had two sons, Ribald and Robert. ==Notes== ==References== *'Parishes: Middleham', in A History of the County of York North Riding: Volume 1, ed. William Page (London, 1914), pp. 251-257. British History Online Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:12th-century English people
title: Ralph Tailboys
